basics.name: Ross Keenan
basics.label: Senior Developer @ ReturnX
basics.// NOTE: The elegant theme doesn't correctly show the image: https://github.com/mudassir0909/jsonresume-theme-elegant/issues/158
basics.summary: Accomplished Fullstack Developer | Spearheading Development of Production-Grade Web Apps

work.name: ReturnX
work.summary:
At ReturnX, I've lead the development of multiple production web apps, and managed an agile development team.
- Lead developer on a highly successful B2B product, Dripcel, used by established South African companies to send millions of customer communications each month.
- Automated internal lead-acquisition and delivery pipelines, leading to a 45% increase in volumes and converted sales.
- Guided the growth of our development team, taking on new members, and leading them on their career path.

work.name: Ask Afrika (Pty) Ltd
work.summary:
I deepened my data & programming knowledge working with industry experts.
- Saved 100's of hours every month by automating crucial client reports.
- Modernised and streamlined data analysis pipelines using Python, R, SQL, and AI. Directly lead to more efficient daily operations.
- Identified and maximized sales opportunities by providing novel, data-driven insights to internal sales-teams, growing new leads by 43%.

work.name: Delve
work.summary:
During my time at Delve, I contributed to various areas/projects.
- Automated repetitive, manual tasks to reduce workload by upwards of 28%.
- Built bespoke web apps, featuring SEO-optimised, mobile-friendly responsive designs. 
- Established robust data-pipelines to unlock novel reporting and analytics opportunities. Directly lead to increased sales and cost-reductions.
